title: @Riot KateyKhaos - Dragon Trainer Tristana
body:
I don't really have much to talk about: Just got home, got a bit of a headache, but I LOVE this skin! Whoever decided on the dance for it needs a raise ASAP.

Just wondering if I could catch you for a bit, if you wanted to talk about/share something about this skin or it's development.

replies.body:
Yo!

So I was trying to think of any like note worthy things in development of the skin and I have a few. 

* The skin was actually started over a year ago before Tristana's visual update, and by started I mean concepted based on her old model.  But once we saw what champion update was cookin (CUTE STUFF) we decided to wait and  re-concept her with the new model in mind. With the new model we were able to make Riggle bigger and it gave us ultimate freedom with her animations. 

* One of the first animation to be completed was her AMAZING death animation....the entire team (like 40 people) groaned and made sad noises when it was shown in our team review.  Lol

* Her animations were done by a team of all male animators, so a team of grown ass men made all dis cute! Even the dance. :3

* Aside from that stuff we pretty much left nothing on the cutting room floor. We got all of the VO, SFX, animations, and particles that we wanted, this skin was a real labor of love.  We really wanted the bond between Tristana and Riggle to feel as real as possible and I think we did it based on the community's reaction to her. :P

If you have any more questions let me know, and I can most likely answer them!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Galetta,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sMiEnAYH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-04T21:22:10.362+0000)
> 
> * Her animations were done by a team of all male animators, so a team of grown ass men made all dis cute! Even the dance. :3
> 

This is the sort of stuff that makes me, a grown ass man, squeal like a little girl... GIVE THOSE MEN SOME COOKIES!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Galetta,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sMiEnAYH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-04T21:22:10.362+0000)

> 
> So I was trying to think of any like note worthy things in development of the skin and I have a few. 
> 
> * The skin was actually started over a year ago before Tristana's visual update, and by started I mean concepted based on her old model.  But once we saw what champion update was cookin (CUTE STUFF) we decided to wait and  re-concept her with the new model in mind. With the new model we were able to make Riggle bigger and it gave us ultimate freedom with her animations. 
> 

Interesting; was it intended to be a Legendary level skin back before she got her VU, or did the update give you the ability to use new tools to make it a Legendary?

> * One of the first animation to be completed was her AMAZING death animation....the entire team (like 40 people) groaned and made sad noises when it was shown in our team review.  Lol
> 

I'm not sure what's worse, the depression I got from the death animation, or the diabetes her dance gave me... eh, I'll send you the medical bills anyway.

> * Her animations were done by a team of all male animators, so a team of grown ass men made all dis cute! Even the dance. :3
> 

Like Aemette said, GIVE THOSE MEN SOME COOKIES and some hot chocolate on top of it.

> * Aside from that stuff we pretty much left nothing on the cutting room floor. We got all of the VO, SFX, animations, and particles that we wanted, this skin was a real labor of love.  We really wanted the bond between Tristana and Riggle to feel as real as possible and I think we did it based on the community's reaction to her. :P
> 

Like I said before, I really did get that. Even though they have their issues with each other (Riggle is CLEARLY not happy to be made to dance, and Tristana seems to get frustrated with him sometimes), it's stuff like the laugh animation, some of the quotes, and even the horribly depressing death animation shows there's still a close bond, and they'd have each others backs.

I think some of my favorite quotes from this skin are from buying items. "Uhhh... don't lick this" for Bloodthirster, "Nope, no, don't chew that-!" (Riggle chews that)" for Statikk Shiv, even a quote for Sunfire Cape that Tristana's would probably never buy.

> If you have any more questions let me know, and I can most likely answer them!

You did the Riggle ward too right? I'm honestly trying to decide whether to get the Riggle ward, or if I should stick with the Fist Bump ward I already have and have gotten attached to.

Also, a few lines that the wiki list as "Unknown Champion Responses", are those referring to the Dragonslayer skins? If so, nice touch!

EDIT: Oh yeah, one more thing; is Riggle's name a reference to the old Wriggle's Lantern item, or was it just a cute name because it sounds close to 'Wiggle'?

EDIT2: The video promo calls it "Dragon Trainer's Video Guide, Volume One" Is this a hint towards other Dragon Trainer skins in the future (Don't worry, it'll just be between us and the whole internet)

Speaking personally, which part of the skin did you work on, or what was your favorite part of it's development?

>Interesting; was it intended to be a Legendary level skin back before she got her VU, or did the update give you the ability to use new tools to make it a Legendary?

Yeah even back then she was going to be a Legendary, but once we started concepting we quickly realized that he old model was going to restrict us greatly. Not just from an animation standpoint but from a modeling standpoint as well, she was so tiny and compact that her proportions compared to Riggle's just didn't feel great.

>You did the Riggle ward too right? I'm honestly trying to decide whether to get the Riggle ward, or if I should stick with the Fist Bump ward I already have and have gotten attached to.

I did! I'm super appreciative to the animation team who allowed me to animate the ward. Since I'm currently being mentored by an animator at Riot I was super excited to get to work on an asset for League! I'm super biased in my opinion (for obvious reasons) but I would say pick up the Riggle ward since it's so friggen cute and it's one of our only wards that's actually a living creature! :3

>Also, a few lines that the wiki list as "Unknown Champion Responses", are those referring to the Dragonslayer skins? If so, nice touch!

We did have plans for those lines to be triggered when you were near a champion with a Dragon Slayer skin, but due to some technical issues we weren't able to hook them up. :<

>EDIT: Oh yeah, one more thing; is Riggle's name a reference to the old Wriggle's Lantern item, or was it just a cute name because it sounds close to 'Wiggle'?

It's more of a reference to the fact that he can never sit still! He's always wriggling around in Tristana's hands!

>EDIT2: The video promo calls it "Dragon Trainer's Video Guide, Volume One" Is this a hint towards other Dragon Trainer skins in the future (Don't worry, it'll just be between us and the whole internet)

I think it's safe to say that, like with most skin lines, we won't stop with a single Dragon Trainer. When more skins come out and who they are for are up for community speculation at this point.


>Speaking personally, which part of the skin did you work on, or what was your favorite part of it's development?

I was primarily responsible for the QA portion of the skin. I made sure we found and fixed all the bugs and that the skin itself was up the the quality bar that skins team has set for Legendary skins! 

The best part of the development of this skin was seeing Riggle come to life, we kinda already knew how Trist would act but Riggle was a whole new character!

Hey Siachi! 

I actually wasn't a part of this skin's development, so I don't have a lot of context here.  Lemme try and summon Riot Galetta, she was the lovely QA lady on this skin - she knows a bit more about the development of the skin! (She also animated the Riggle Ward!) :D

I love this skin so much that now I am trying to learn and main Tristana. Every year the skins team causes countless other victims like me to be even worse at League of Legends than they already are. I hope you are happy, you monsters.

~~Thank you all so much this is amazing.~~
I feel like we did the same thing with Gravelord Azir. ;D Good luck learning Trist! She's really fun, imo! <3
i love this skin as well. i couldn't wait till the snowdown skin thing so i got it on the spot. i cant tell you how much i love this skin. its awesome.

Glad to hear that you'll try to get someone to talk about it. I can't express how many marks this skin hits for me! I'm honestly a dragon fanatic, and I love seeing you guys at riot going the extra mile by giving her a new VO with a lot of "I have a pet dragon" lines. 

I feel like the various animations really sells the skin for me. Even if they still show some issues with each other, there's still a strong bond between them.

Ahhh, that's so awesome to hear! I'm so glad you're excited about the skin! ^-^ This was one of my favorite skins to watch in development - as Galetta said, there was a ton of stuff that went into her, and she was re-concepted and received a ton of love!

Best skin!  I LOVE this one.  ALso, even though I'm a Tristana main, I never liked the "march" dance, so I LOVE her little "puppet Riggle" dance.  All the little touches are great (riding Riggle while ghosting is great).  Awesome job to all the team.  One last thing, maybe its just because I love the skin so much, but I swear it even PLAYS a little bit smoother than even the default skin.  I'm not sure if the animation is quicker, or just smoother, but it is all around just an amazing job.

Agree with you there; the marching didn't really do it for me (Just kind of bland considering some of the other dances champs get, but she's a soldier so I can understand that). I haven't really payed much attention to whether it plays smoother or not, but then I don't really do a good job at noticing those things.
